formatted_address: 83 Punggol Central, B2-K9 Waterway Point, Singapore 828761
name: Twenty Loaf Toasties (Waterway Point)

reviews.text: I chose egg mayo thinking it will not go wrong since it’s a classic flavor. Eggs was not well seasoned. Unless they were hoping the pork floss sprinkles will help to replace the seasoning. The sweetness from pork floss did help a little but a pinch of salt will lift the overall flavor profile better. I don’t eat salty food but I expect some minimal seasoning. Bread was toasty and good portion of egg. Just fell short on seasoning.

Just a PSA, $1.95 promo not stated that it doesn’t apply when getting the buy 3 free 1 deal. Even tho I got 2 of the $1.95 flavour.

Not that I really care about the 25 cents discount. But it would be nice to be more transparent about the pricing w customers and not having to have to ask about it after toast has been heated and money is paid.

Receipt wasn’t even given after payment.

Also, paying $2-$4 for a quarter of a sandwich was also pretty hefty imo.

Will I be back probably not, but if you’re looking for a snack and a variety, it’d probably work

i bought home & reheat w my air fryer. my favourites are the avocado, cheesy bakwa and the chilli crab. i don’t even normally like avocado but somehow their avocado doesn’t have that smell to it and it’s rlly yummy. they put a lot of filling, so the price is not too bad esp when they have their 1.95 promos

Many different flavours to choose from and all very nice, quite affordable too! The staff always give me $5 cash voucher which can be used next time with a min spend of $15! Very worth it, i bought 6 toasties for less than $12 (with use of voucher)
really love the new chilli crab flavour the most, lots of fillings were given
